Instruction: Peel the papaya, remove the seeds, and slice it thinly.
Using a vegetable peeler, peel the cucumber into ribbons.
Grate the carrot and thinly slice the red onion.
In a large bowl, combine the sliced papaya, cucumber ribbons, grated carrot, thinly sliced red onion, and torn mint leaves.
In a small bowl, squeeze the juice of one lime and mix it with honey and a pinch of salt to make the dressing.
Drizzle the lime dressing over the salad ingredients.
Toss gently to coat all ingredients evenly with the dressing.
Refrigerate the salad for 15-20 minutes to allow the flavors to meld.
Serve the papaya salad chilled as a light and refreshing side dish.
